column1: "description": "The table refers to village wise distribution of dugwells according to constraints. It has been sourced from 2nd census of Minor Irrigation Scheme (1993-94) from Ministry of Water Resources."

"description": "The table refers to statewise distribution of Deep Tubewells according to the farmers holding size . The report has been sourced from 2nd census of minor irrigation scheme(1993-94) from ministry of water resources."
